sentences.en: The receptionist recognized him at once.
sentences.cn: 那名接待员马上认出了他。

sentences.en: The receptionist led the way to the boardroom.
sentences.cn: 接待员领路来到董事会会议室。

sentences.en: He had the receptionist almost jumping through hoops for him. But to no avail.
sentences.cn: 他让接待员为他几乎饱经折磨，但根本没有用。
